ticket.title: RFC-0029 REQ-0009 projection multi-sink outage continuity and deferred replay boundedness

tickets.reason: Outage continuity relies on queue and anti-entropy controls.
Deferred replay boundedness depends on replay/recovery receipt closure.
Continuity containment relies on projection isolation and authority-surface controls.
Cross-RFC CAC traceability overlay is required for continuity gate contract integrity.

in_scope: Enforce TP-EIO29-001/003/004/005 continuity predicates for sink outage/churn/partition scenarios.
Guarantee authoritative progression remains truth-plane-only while replay converges post-recovery.
Fail closed on missing/stale/invalid temporal authority in continuity decisions.

steps: Bind continuity scenario digests to window and time-authority envelope digests.
Implement continuity drills for multi-sink outage/churn/partition scenarios.
Add negatives for unresolved continuity/replay/temporal-authority state.
Capture continuity and replay-boundedness evidence artifacts.

criteria: Authoritative decisions remain independent of projection sink state across outage scenarios.
Deferred replay converges idempotently within declared replay windows.

notes.security: Projection surfaces are non-authoritative and must not influence admission truth.
notes.verification: Include chaos scenarios with backlog envelope and replay convergence checks.
notes.general: This ticket implements REQ-0009 continuity and deferred replay boundedness obligations.
